verses.verse: Now there was a famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the previous <S%H7223><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> that had occurred <S%H1961><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Abraham. <S%H85><s%> So Isaac <S%H3327><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Gerar, <S%H1642><s%> to Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him and said, <S%H559><s%> "Do not go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> stay <S%H7931><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I shall tell <S%H559><s%> you.

"Sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H776><s%> and I will be with you and bless <S%H1288><s%> you, for to you and to your descendants <S%H2233><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H411><s%> lands, <S%H776><s%> and I will establish <S%H6965><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to your father Abraham. <S%H1><s%>

"And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> your descendants <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> your descendants <S%H2233><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H411><s%> lands; <S%H776><s%> and by your descendants <S%H2233><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be blessed; <S%H1288><s%>

because <S%H6118><s%> <S%H834><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> Me and kept <S%H8104><s%> My charge, <S%H4931><s%> My commandments, <S%H4687><s%> My statutes <S%H2708><s%> and My laws. <S%H8451><s%> "
So Isaac <S%H3327><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Gerar. <S%H1642><s%>

When the men <S%H376><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> about his wife, <S%H802><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "She is my sister, <S%H269><s%>" for he was afraid <S%H3372><s%> to say, <S%H559><s%> "my wife, <S%H802><s%>" [thinking,] "the men <S%H376><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> might kill <S%H2026><s%> me on account <S%H5921><s%> of Rebekah, <S%H7259><s%> for she is beautiful. <S%H2896><s%>"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H3588><s%> he had been there <S%H8033><s%> a long <S%H748><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> that Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> looked <S%H8259><s%> out through <S%H1157><s%> a window, <S%H2474><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was caressing <S%H6711><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> Rebekah. <S%H7259><s%>

Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> certainly <S%H389><s%> she is your wife! <S%H802><s%> How <S%H349><s%> then did you say, <S%H559><s%> 'She is my sister <S%H269><s%>'?" And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Because <S%H3588><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> 'Lest <S%H6435><s%> I die <S%H4191><s%> on account <S%H5921><s%> of her.'"

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> to us? One <S%H259><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> might easily <S%H4592><s%> have lain <S%H7901><s%> with your wife, <S%H802><s%> and you would have brought <S%H935><s%> guilt <S%H817><s%> upon us."

So Abimelech <S%H40><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "He who touches <S%H5060><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> man <S%H376><s%> or his wife <S%H802><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put <S%H4191><s%> to death. <S%H4191><s%>"

Now Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sowed <S%H2232><s%> in that land, <S%H776><s%> and reaped <S%H4672><s%> in the same <S%H1931><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> a hundredfold. <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8180><s%> And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him,

and the man <S%H376><s%> became <S%H1431><s%> rich, <S%H1431><s%> and continued <S%H1980><s%> to grow <S%H1432><s%> richer <S%H1432><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he became <S%H1431><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> wealthy; <S%H1431><s%>

for he had <S%H1961><s%> possessions <S%H4735><s%> of flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds <S%H1241><s%> and a great <S%H7227><s%> household, <S%H5657><s%> so that the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> envied <S%H7065><s%> him.

Now all <S%H3605><s%> the wells <S%H875><s%> which <S%H834><s%> his father's servants <S%H1><s%> had dug <S%H5650><s%> in the days <S%H2658><s%> of Abraham <S%H3117><s%> his father, the Philistines <S%H85><s%> stopped <S%H6430><s%> up by filling <S%H5640><s%> them with earth. <S%H4390><s%>
Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> away from us, for you are too <S%H3966><s%> powerful <S%H6105><s%> for us."
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Gerar, <S%H1642><s%> and settled <S%H3427><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

Then Isaac <S%H3327><s%> dug <S%H2658><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the wells <S%H875><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had been dug <S%H2658><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of his father Abraham, <S%H1><s%> for the Philistines <S%H85><s%> had stopped <S%H6430><s%> them up after <S%H5640><s%> the death <S%H310><s%> of Abraham; <S%H4194><s%> and he gave <S%H85><s%> them the same <S%H7121><s%> names <S%H8034><s%> which <S%H8034><s%> his father had given <S%H834><s%> them.
But when Isaac's servants <S%H5650><s%> dug <S%H2658><s%> in the valley <S%H5158><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> a well <S%H875><s%> of flowing <S%H2416><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%>

the herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> of Gerar <S%H1642><s%> quarreled <S%H7378><s%> with the herdsmen <S%H7462><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The water <S%H4325><s%> is ours!" So he named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> Esek, <S%H6230><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they contended <S%H6229><s%> with him.

Then they dug <S%H2658><s%> another <S%H312><s%> well, <S%H875><s%> and they quarreled <S%H7378><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> it too, <S%H1571><s%> so he named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> it Sitnah. <S%H7856><s%>

And he moved <S%H6275><s%> away <S%H6275><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> and dug <S%H2658><s%> another <S%H312><s%> well, <S%H875><s%> and they did not quarrel <S%H7378><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> it; so he named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> it Rehoboth, <S%H7344><s%> for he said, <S%H559><s%> "At last <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6258><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H7337><s%> room <S%H7337><s%> for us, and we shall be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>"
Then he went <S%H5927><s%> up from there <S%H8033><s%> to Beersheba. <S%H884><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him the same <S%H1931><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "I am the God <S%H430><s%> of your father Abraham; <S%H1><s%> Do not fear, <S%H85><s%> for I am with you. I will bless <S%H3372><s%> you, and multiply <S%H1288><s%> your descendants, <S%H7235><s%> For the sake <S%H2233><s%> of My servant <S%H5668><s%> Abraham. <S%H5650><s%>"

So he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> Isaac's servants <S%H5650><s%> dug <S%H3738><s%> a well. <S%H875><s%>

Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> came <S%H1980><s%> to him from Gerar <S%H1642><s%> with his adviser <S%H4828><s%> Ahuzzath, <S%H276><s%> and Phicol <S%H6369><s%> the commander <S%H8269><s%> of his army. <S%H6635><s%>
And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Why <S%H4069><s%> have you come <S%H935><s%> to me, since you hate <S%H8130><s%> me, and have sent <S%H7971><s%> me away <S%H7971><s%> from you?"

And they said, <S%H559><s%> "We see <S%H7200><s%> plainly <S%H7200><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> with you; so we said, <S%H559><s%> 'Let there now <S%H4994><s%> be an oath <S%H423><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us, [even] between <S%H996><s%> you and us, and let us make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you,

that you will do <S%H6213><s%> us no <S%H518><s%> harm, <S%H9567><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as we have not touched <S%H5060><s%> you and have done <S%H6213><s%> to you nothing <S%H7534><s%> but good, <S%H9185><s%> and have sent <S%H7971><s%> you away <S%H7971><s%> in peace. <S%H7965><s%> You are now <S%H6258><s%> the blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>' "
Then he made <S%H6213><s%> them a feast, <S%H4960><s%> and they ate <S%H398><s%> and drank. <S%H8354><s%>

And in the morning <S%H1242><s%> they arose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> and exchanged <S%H7650><s%> oaths; <S%H7650><s%> then Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them away <S%H7971><s%> and they departed <S%H1980><s%> from him in peace. <S%H7965><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the same <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that Isaac's servants <S%H5650><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in and told <S%H5046><s%> him about <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had dug, <S%H2658><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "We have found <S%H4672><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>"

So he called <S%H7121><s%> it Shibah; <S%H7656><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> is Beersheba <S%H884><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And when Esau <S%H6215><s%> was forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> he married <S%H3947><s%> <S%H802><s%> Judith <S%H3067><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Beeri <S%H882><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and Basemath <S%H1315><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Elon <S%H356><s%> the Hittite; <S%H2850><s%>
and they brought <S%H1961><s%> grief <S%H4786><s%> <S%H7307><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and Rebekah. <S%H7259><s%>
